InstalledItem.Name: Turret
InstalledItem.Description: Multitask on the battlefield with this remote turret system. Featuring precise controls and a wide field of fire, the turret allows pilots to add combat support to their resume.

InstalledItem.Name: Scorpion GT-215 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 2

The Scorpion GT-215 is a hydraulically-driven Gatling-type rotary cannon designed to deliver smaller rounds at a very high rate of fire. The Scorpion is designed to shred armor on very fast targets, sacrificing power for absolute saturation of the target area.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd.
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

With more than enough get up and go to handle your vehicle’s daily energy needs, the Radix from Lightning Power Ltd. is a power plant you can count on to get you where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: Frost-Star SL
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Whether cruising across the ground or sailing through space, there’s a J-Span cooler perfect for you. The Frost-Star SL is a mid-tier cooler designed to bring the line’s reliability to ground and open-canopy vehicles.

Grade: C

The Prevenir has been refined by extensive military field testing, making it the go-to vehicle radar for many across the UEE.
